entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
